status: BILL NOT PASSED - Preparation Guidelines Only
note: The HTML file is NOT an actual budget. It is a 'bakhshname' (circular) with guidelines for preparing the 1405 budget bill.

budget_priorities: Support living standards and food security for low-income households
Ensure energy and water supply for production
policy_approaches: No new projects except water and energy sectors
Reduce budget deficit through spending discipline
Continue targeted subsidies (cash and electronic vouchers)

actual_numbers: NONE - This is a planning document, not a budget
next_steps: Wait for actual 1405 budget bill to be submitted to parliament
Budget bill typically submitted in autumn (Azar/Dey)
May not be finalized until spring 1405
